short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Overlay dog images on social media content.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Receive less stimulation from Social Media and also be realistic in how much you can cope without knowing what's happening in the world. You've locked your phone away but what can you do with your desktop? This extension places temporary overlays of dog images for Twitter, Instagram, and Youtube. You can still see the images once you hover over the dog image. Uses docs.google.com to fetch dog images only.
